radio.label: A1
radio.title: Using a 1-10 scale where 1 means you disagree strongly and 10 means you agree strongly, please rate your evaluation of the ad with this character.
radio.comment: Please rate each option by moving the button to a rating position.
radio.row: Motivates me to push my limits
I will tell my friends about this ad
Makes me more interested to buy Rexona Men products
Is believable in the context of the storyline
